## mulV344 variable

Multiplies 4x4 matrix `m` with 3D vector `v` and assumes `w=1`<!-- -->, i.e. the vector is interpreted as `[x,y,z,1]`<!-- -->. After transformation applies perspective divide of the resulting XYZ components.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mulV344: MatOpMV
```
